clubs.name: Science Club
clubs.description: Exploring the wonders of science through experiments, competitions, and field trips. Members participate in science fairs and national competitions.

clubs.name: Debate & Public Speaking
clubs.description: Developing critical thinking and communication skills through competitive debate and public speaking events.

clubs.name: Drama & Theatre
clubs.description: Nurturing creativity and self-expression through theatrical performances, workshops, and productions.

clubs.name: Music & Choir
clubs.description: Developing musical talents through vocal training, instrumental lessons, and performances.

clubs.name: Art & Design
clubs.description: Exploring various art forms including painting, sculpture, graphic design, and digital art.

clubs.name: Coding & Robotics
clubs.description: Building digital literacy and problem-solving skills through programming and robotics.

clubs.name: Environmental Club
clubs.description: Promoting environmental awareness and sustainability through projects and community initiatives.

clubs.name: Young Entrepreneurs
clubs.description: Developing business skills and entrepreneurial mindset through practical projects and mentorship.

sports.name: Football (Soccer)
sports.description: Training in football skills, teamwork, and competitive play. Teams compete in inter-school and regional tournaments.

sports.name: Basketball
sports.description: Developing basketball skills, strategy, and competitive spirit through training and tournaments.

sports.name: Swimming
sports.description: Professional swimming training for all levels, from beginners to competitive swimmers.

sports.name: Track & Field
sports.description: Athletics training including sprinting, long-distance running, jumping, and throwing events.

sports.name: Tennis
sports.description: Professional tennis coaching for beginners and advanced players, with opportunities for tournament participation.

sports.name: Volleyball
sports.description: Team volleyball training focusing on skills, coordination, and competitive play.

community.title: Outreach Programs
community.description: Students participate in various community outreach initiatives including visiting orphanages, hospitals, and elderly care centers.

community.title: Educational Support
community.description: Supporting less privileged students through tutoring programs and educational material donations.

community.title: Environmental Initiatives
community.description: Community environmental projects promoting sustainability and environmental awareness.

community.title: Fundraising Events
community.description: Annual fundraising events supporting various charitable causes and school development projects.

support.description: Professional counseling support for students dealing with academic stress, emotional challenges, or personal issues. Confidential sessions available.
Specialized support for students with learning difficulties, including dyslexia support, ADHD management, and personalized learning plans.
Comprehensive career counseling and university placement assistance, including aptitude testing, university applications, and scholarship guidance.
On-site health clinic with qualified nurses, first aid services, and health education programs.
One-on-one academic mentoring programs pairing students with teachers for personalized academic support and guidance.
